# emitterZPosition

**Instance Property**

Specifies the center of the particle emitter shape along the z-axis. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var emitterZPosition: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/emitter-shape] for details of how the emitterZPosition relates to the possible emitter shapes.

Default is `0.0`.

## Emitter Geometry

- **renderMode**: Defines how particle cells are rendered into the layer.
- **emitterPosition**: The position of the center of the particle emitter. Animatable.
- **emitterShape**: Specifies the emitter shape.
- **emitterDepth**: Determines the depth of the emitter shape.
- **emitterSize**: Determines the size of the particle emitter shape. Animatable.
